root: ^Welcome to GPU Region and Hello, adventurer!
^You wanna know about the material you can collect here? It’s called video memory.

c-0: ^Video memory (or VRAM) is what your GPU uses to store data like textures and graphical info.
^The more video memory your GPU has, the better it can handle complex visuals and high-quality textures.
^In this area or world, you can collect video memory after defeating certain enemies. It’s a rare and valuable resource that will help you boost your GPU's performance!
^That’s right! Stock up on video memory, and your GPU will stay strong!
^You got it! Now go grab that video memory and power up!
c-1: ^No worries! If you change your mind, just let me know.
